summary: The “End Polluter Welfare Act of 2025” aims to eliminate various federal subsidies for fossil fuel production. It proposes changes across several areas including tax expenditures (ending tax breaks and credits), royalty rates (increasing them), loan programs, and international financial institutions' funding of fossil fuel projects. The bill seeks to repeal existing legislation that supports fossil fuels and mandates a study of further subsidies for elimination. It affects various codes of law, seeking to shift incentives away from fossil fuels.
